SAAIR Conference

November 3rd - November 5th

Largest AI & Robotics gathering in South India.

Introducing the South Asian AI and Robotics Conference (SAAIRC) - NIT AP

The South Asian AI and Robotics Conference (SAAIRC) is poised to be an extraordinary gathering that transcends boundaries and harnesses the power of human ingenuity. Hosted by the esteemed National Institute of Technology Andhra Pradesh (NIT AP), this conference is a convergence of the brightest minds in the fields of AI and robotics.

SAAIRC serves as a dynamic platform where pioneering professors and groundbreaking researchers from across the globe converge to exchange ideas, insights, and innovations. The conference is a melting pot of brilliance, where ideas collide, and possibilities multiply. Get ready to dive into a realm of cutting-edge technologies, breakthroughs, and transformative discussions.

SAAIRC brings together a congregation of visionaries, thought leaders, and experts in AI and robotics. Engage in meaningful conversations, connect with like-minded peers, and forge partnerships that drive groundbreaking collaborations. It's a networking opportunity like no other – an avenue to create, inspire, and fuel the future.

Mark Your Calendar: 3rd Nov 2023

Join us at the South Asian AI and Robotics Conference (SAAIRC) – Where Brilliance Converges, Ideas Flourish, and the Future Unfolds. Be a part of this unprecedented journey as we propel the realms of AI and robotics to new horizons.
